meanings.sent1: The team is comanaging the project effectively.
meanings.sent2: We are comanaging the budget for the event.
meanings.sent3: Comanaging the office supplies is a fun challenge for us.
meanings.sent4: She and her colleague are comanaging the marketing campaign like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Comanaging the household chores has brought us closer together.

meanings.definition: The act of managing something together with others.
meanings.sent1: Comanaging requires good communication and teamwork.
meanings.sent2: The comanaging of the company has led to great success.
meanings.sent3: The comanaging of the school fundraiser was a group effort.
meanings.sent4: In the comanaging of the project, everyone's input is valued.
meanings.sent5: Their comanaging of the event was seamless and efficient.
